metadata.title: CVE-2019-5058 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An exploitable code execution vulnerability exists in the XCF imagerendering functionality of SDL2_image 2.0.4. A specially crafted XCF imagecan cause a heap overflow, resulting in code execution. An attacker candisplay a specially crafted image to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: libsdl2-image package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
